channel.title: Election of TAG chair
channel.description: Maybe I missed a topic, but I was wondering what the process will be for electing a new TAG chair. Some questions: - How will candidates be selected? - When and how will candidates present themselves (do we have time to reflect a little bit)? - Who will be able to vote? - ...

item.title: Election of TAG chair
item.dc:creator: Herman
item.description:
Maybe I missed a topic, but I was wondering what the process will be for electing a new TAG chair. Some questions:

  • How will candidates be selected?
  • When and how will candidates present themselves (do we have time to reflect a little bit)?
  • Who will be able to vote?
  • …
